metadata.synopsis: Party reflects on the ominous black mirror in the Sharran Grotto

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That mirror... now that I remember. I'd stand before it. Marvel at how it seemed to consume all...
0.context: NodeContext: Recognition/disquiet upon looking at an ominous sharran artefact

1.speaker: Player
1.text: That mirror reflects nothing - it only consumes, and offers darkness.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: This mirror is ancient - all the way back to the time of Gorothir. Almost like a window to the Shadowfell.
